question: Linux uses a time-sharing algorithm ___________
options: ['a) to pair preemptive scheduling between multiple processes', 'b) for tasks where absolute priorities are more important than fairness', 'c) all of the mentioned', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) to pair preemptive scheduling between multiple processes
option2: b) for tasks where absolute priorities are more important than fairness
